# Metrics

This document enumerates the metrics collected by this project using the [Glean SDK](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/index.html).
This project may depend on other projects which also collect metrics.
This means you might have to go searching through the dependency tree to get a full picture of everything collected by this project.

# Pings

- [advertisements](#advertisements)
- [article-contents](#article-contents)
- [deletion-request](#deletion-request)
- [events](#events)
- [study-enrollment](#study-enrollment)
- [user-journey](#user-journey)
- [youtube-ads](#youtube-ads)
- [youtube-video-details](#youtube-video-details)
- [youtube-video-recommendations](#youtube-video-recommendations)

## advertisements

Metadata about any detected advertisements

**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778196>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| advertisements.ads |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |Metadata about any ads on this page  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| advertisements.body |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |Body of the current page  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| advertisements.page_id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |A unique ID for this visit  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| advertisements.url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |URL for the current page  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |

## deletion-request

This is a built-in ping that is assembled out of the box by the Glean SDK.

See the Glean SDK documentation for the [`deletion-request` ping](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/deletion-request.html).

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |

This is a built-in ping that is assembled out of the box by the Glean SDK.

## user-journey

A page navigation event


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778196>

**Reasons this ping may be sent:**

- `page-navigation-observed`: Page navigation was observed.


All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| user_journey.attention_and_audio_duration |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long a user audio event occurred while attention was focused on the tab.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| user_journey.attention_duration |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long the user attention event occurred (window/tab was focused and not idle).  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| user_journey.audio_duration |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long a user audio event occurred.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| user_journey.max_relative_scroll_depth |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The largest depth reach on the page, as a proportion of the total page height.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)|<ul><li>unit: percentage</li></ul>|never | |
| user_journey.page_id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |A unique ID associated with a page visit. Each page ID is 128-bit value, randomly generated with the Web Crypto API and stored as a hexadecimal string.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| user_journey.page_visit_start_date_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |When did the page visit start.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| user_journey.page_visit_stop_date_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |When did the page visit stop.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| user_journey.referrer |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |The HTTP Referrer URL (if set).  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| user_journey.url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |The URL visited.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |

## youtube-ads

Information about an ad that was shown to the user on YouTube

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://github.com/mozilla-rally/rally/pull/222>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| youtube_ad.ad_video_id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The YouTube video id of the ad's video, if this ad has associated video content  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.advertiser_info |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |A JSON object with any info about the advertiser that was scraped from the About This Ad URL, such as Name and Location.  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.advertiser_website |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The advertiser's website  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.body |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |The ad's body text  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.description |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The ad's short description text  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.destination_url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |The destination URL of the ad's call-to-action i.e. where you get sent if you click on the ad Note: this is usually a doubleclick.net or googleadservices link, with the actual destination at the end of the URL query parameters  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.page_id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |A unique ID for this page visit  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.raw_data |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |A JSON object containing the raw data that was captured  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.targeting_reasons |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |A JSON object with a list of reasons that Google gave for why this ad was targeted to this user. Scraped from the About This Ad URL.  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.title |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The ad's title text  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.type |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The type of ad that was shown e.g. "instreamVideoAd"  |||never | |
| youtube_ad.url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |URL for the current page  |||never | |

- <https://github.com/mozilla-rally/rally/pull/222>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| youtube_video_details.author |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The name of the video's author / channel  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.author_channel_id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The id of the video's author / channel  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.contains_sponsored_content |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether or not this video contains sponsored content. This is when the creator is paid to promote or endorse something. See: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/10588440?nohelpkit=1  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.description |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |The video's description  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.is_live_content |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether or not this video is a live stream  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.keywords |[string_list](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string_list.html) |A list of keywords associated with the video  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.length |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The length of the video in seconds  ||<ul><li>unit: seconds</li></ul>|never | |
| youtube_video_details.page_id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |A unique ID for this page visit  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.raw_data |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |A JSON object containing the raw data that was captured  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.title |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The video's title  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |URL for the current page  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.video_id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The id of the video (i.e. what comes after "watch?v=")  |||never | |
| youtube_video_details.view_count |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of views this video has  ||<ul><li>unit: views</li></ul>|never | |

## youtube-video-recommendations

A list of algorithmic YouTube video recommendations

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://github.com/mozilla-rally/rally/pull/222>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Bug 1778367](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1778367)||never | |
| youtube_video_recommendations.details_list |[text](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/text.html) |A JSON array of all recommendations found along with some parsed details  |||never | |
| youtube_video_recommendations.first_twenty_video_ids |[string_list](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string_list.html) |A list of YouTube video IDs corresponding to the first 20 video recommendations on this page. The limit of 20 is imposed by Glean. This metric is only set for the initial set of recommendations.  |||never | |
| youtube_video_recommendations.is_initial_set |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether this is the first set of recommendations that was loaded on this page  |||never | |
| youtube_video_recommendations.page_id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |A unique ID for this page visit  |||never | |
| youtube_video_recommendations.url |[url](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/url.html) |URL for the current page  |||never | |

Data categories are [defined here](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection).
